original_text: I will choose rulers for them who will truly take care of them. My people will no longer be afraid. They will all be safe.’ That is what the Lord says.
korean_text: 내가 그들을 기르는 목자들을 그들 위에 세우리니 그들이 다시는 두려워하거나 놀라거나 잃어 버리지 아니하리라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: I will choose rulers for them
who will truly take care of them
My people will no longer be afraid
sentences.korean_translation: 내 백성은 더 이상 두려워하지 않을 것이요

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says
